title: The font from "The Kingdom" movie title sequence
content:
Would anyone happen to know the name of the typeface in the title sequence for the movie "The Kingdom"

see screen cap below...Thanks, Ken

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228160629im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kingdom_6200.jpg)
author: weetkee

comments.content: I don't know the exact typeface, but if you're okay with something close, [United](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228160629/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531) would definitely fit the bill.
Thanks a bunch for the comments ... Gridnik is the one!
